title: problème serveur, lien Gmail - Thunderbird
creator: ADM.LABELLEMEUNIERE
content: Bonjour, J'ai créé un message d'absence pendant mes congés, ce message à généré une saturation de ma boite mails, depuis je n'arrive plus à faire fonctionner correctement Thunderbird. Le lien entre Gmail et Thunderbird semble ne plus fonctionner. Comment dois-je procéder ? Est-ce que je peux réinitialiser les paramètres de Thunderbird sans perdre de données et si oui comment ? Merci

title: Email Archive
creator: finance31
content:
Hello,

I adjusted the archive settings on our account and now all my archived emails have disappeared and they are no where to be found. Not in trash or spam. I put the archive settings back the way they were and nothing changes. In the web version the emails are still there, so for some reason they are just misplaced in the program. Can you help me figure out where they went?

title: Pictures not displaying
creator: simoncharlestomsett
content:
When I receive a newsletter from my club, it doesn't show the pictures. It does describe the picture and warns it might be AI generated. If I reply to the email or forward it, the pictures are displayed. I suspect this might be a settings problem. The original email includes:

[image: A picnic table and benches on a stone surface AI-generated content may be incorrect.] [image: A group of people dancing in a room with lights AI-generated content may be incorrect.] 

[image: A person and person standing next to a vase AI-generated content

may be incorrect.] [image: A person sitting at a table with food on it AI-generated content may be incorrect.] [image: A group of people sitting at a table with plates of food AI-generated content may be incorrect.]

[image: A group of people dancing in a room with lights AI-generated content may be incorrect.] [image: A group of women posing for a photo AI-generated content may be incorrect.] [image: A group of people standing in a room with lights AI-generated content may be incorrect.]

Can anyone shed some light on this?

title: Transfer Thunderbird from one to another windows-PC with ALL SUBFOLDERS
creator: eckhard3
content: Hi, i copied my Thunderbird (windows 10 Prof)) to a new Notebook (windows 11 Prof) by overrighting the Standard-Profilfolders (in ROAMING and LOCAL) of the new Installation with the Folders of the old Installation (both are Version 146.0.1 but old is 32-Bit and new is 64-Bit) I use more than 2 accounts, and in some accounts, I created subfolders in the 'In' folder to preselect the emails by rules after they arrive Result is: alls Subfolders are missing and some accounts' 'In' Folder are empty. The Account settings seems to be corrct, means i can load new EMails even if the IN-Folder is empty. But i miss the exosting EMails there and the Subfolders content.
